abstract: Television and print ads will look similar from country to country; digital ads, on Web sites and in social media, will be more customized for local markets.
snippet: Television and print ads will look similar from country to country; digital ads, on Web sites and in social media, will be more customized for local markets.
lead_paragraph: IN 2008, the last time the price of a barrel of oil was in three digits, James D. Farley recalls that his company, Ford Motor, was readying a new version of its big F-150 truck.

headline.main: Ford Tries a Global Campaign for its Global Car
headline.print_headline: Ford Tries a Global Campaign for its Global Car
